name: RFCK Showdown
description:
it's rowdyfuckerscopkillers. it's a game. on discord. play it. but play this first. or afterwards. follow your heart, as they say

2 ways 2 win: let yyour slime hoard reach the top of the screen or eliminate the opponent.

either shoot the enemy to make em ded, or shoot their slime while it's falling down (u will suffer some slowdown tho)

dab to charge up your P. when it's full u can shoot more for some time, cool!

press enter to select stuff, rest of the controls r explained in options

win or die, says endless war

everything is from me, except for the victory music, it's from balloon kid

antivirus software might bitch about it, but it's clean, trust me >:^]
